org.mini2Dx.core.reflect.jvm

Class JvmField

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.reflect.jvm.JvmField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Field

    public class JvmField
extends java.lang.Object
implements Field
    Implementation of Field where JVM-based reflection is supported
